heroSection.mainText: Simplify and Grow Your Retail Business with
heroSection.commonText: Its user-friendly interface enables you to send invoices after sale,create quotations as well as track expenses, manage inventory, check daily transaction, view and update financial reports, among other things.

aboutHome.firstPara: Using the {{cd}}, you can manage your company's sales and marketing modules. {{cd}} software automates tasks including client sales, manage inventory, and distribution activities.
aboutHome.secondPara: {{cd}} software not only assists you in managing your business but also keeps track of your inventory and personnel. It also features an extensive account management system.

solutions.trackIncomeExpense: Track all types of Income & Expense
